# `SmsPhoneNumberRef` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| phoneNumber | `string` | Yes | A phone number provisioned for SMS communications in E.164 format. E.g. +13175555555 or +34234234234 |
